Title: ADC coalition: Political rivalry or alternative governance ideology?
Summary: Emerging indicators suggest that the coalition formed by some opposition politicians under the African Democratic Congress (ADC) is a feeble imitation of the APC merger . The coalition is crafted as a political power grab with no clear roadmap for socioeconomic revival .

Title: N210tr probe: Senate berates NNPCL boss for defiance, issues ultimatum
Summary: The Senate has mounted pressure on the Nigerian National Petroleum Company Limited . The corporation’s refusal to account for N210 trillion flagged in its audited financial statements .

Title: WCO, Nigeria’s multilateral influence and national devt
Summary: WCO, Nigeria’s multilateral influence and national devt . Dr Akinwumi Adesina as the President of the African Development Bank (AfDB) Group and Prof. Benedict Okey Oramah, the President and Chairman of the Board of Directors of African Export-Import Bank, will exit from key global institutions

Title: ECOWAS Court rejects bid to overturn $10,000 judgment against Nigeria
Summary: ECOWAS Court of Justice rejects bid to overturn $10,000 judgment against Nigeria . Nigerian government sought to overturn earlier judgment in prominent human rights case of Mr Gregory Todd against the country .

Title: INEC deploys online party registration portal as applications hit 129
Summary: INEC deploys online party registration portal as applications hit 129 . The Independent National Electoral Commission has announced the development of a new online portal to handle political party registration .

Title: Lagos Assembly reviews new tenancy bill
Summary: Lagos State House of Assembly has moved to improve landlord-tenant relations . Tenancy Bill passed the second reading stage on Thursday . Speaker Mudashiru Obasa said the bill aimed to redefine the legal framework for tenancy agreements, rights, responsibilities, and eviction processes in Lagos .

Title: Amotekun dismisses 6 female recruits over pregnancy
Summary: Ogun State Security Network Agency, also known as Amotekun, dismisses six female recruits from its training camp after they were found to be pregnant . The State Corps conducted a routine pregnancy test on about 125 female recruits in the camp .

Title: Visa war: FG explains stance as US slams tighter measures
Summary: The Federal Government yesterday denied stopping the issuance of the 5-year non-immigrant multiple-entry visa for United States of American, USA, citizens . The US cited as reason for the latest visa restrictions against Nigerians .

Title: 2027: ADC’ll dislodge Tinubu, APC — Aregbesola
Summary: Interim Secretary of African Democratic Congress, Ogbeni Rauf Aregbesola declared that the party will trounce President Bola Tinubu and the All Progressives Congress, APC . He urged party members to put aside personal interests, differences and work towards its success .

Title: A’Ibom man to die by hanging for beheading brother
Summary: Akwa Ibom State High Court in Uyo has sentenced 29-year-old Akaninyene Thomas Okpon to death by hanging for murdering his elder brother, Friday Thomas Enyenokpon, in Ikot Abasi Asutan, Ibesikpo Asutan Local Government Area . Another elder sibling, I
